page.title: 10Playground Games.
page.content: These are some of the more popular playground games. Bulldogs, Hopscotch, Concentration, Skipping, Tag, French Skipping, May I, Polo, Stuck in the Mud and One Two Three in. Here are a few of the games described in detail. Bulldogs, is played between two semi_circles, one child stands between them.He shouts "Bulldogs"and the other children have to try to run from one semi_circle to the other without being touched. Concentration, six people sit in a circle and all have a number from one to six.You pat your lap and clap your hands and then click your fingers then call out each others numbers in time with the action.When a person calls wrongly then that person is out of the game.
